Name: Support Healing
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nTrigger QTE to add one continuous buff to yourself, lasting for 4s, restoring HP equal to 1.5% of max HP per second. Buff duration refreshes on repeated triggers.

Name: Rapid Signature
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nPing 1 Orb to obtain 1 extra Energy. Signature DMG increases by 45%.

Name: Matrix Protect
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nCD time of Matrix reduces by 2s. Obtain 1 random Signal Orb when entering it.

Name: Switch Traps
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nEach substitution will add Curse effect to all enemies around, dealing damage equal to 120% ATK per second for 8s. Buff duration refreshes on repeated triggers.

Name: Signature Buff
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nAfter casting Signature, gain a shield that absorbs damage equal to 15% of max HP, 20% Extra Damage, and Super Armor for 8s.

Name: Intensity Response
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nHealing effect increases by 15%. Increases the Extra Damage Bonus of targets healed by 20% for 5s.

Name: Switch Buff
Description: Health +1000, HP +200.\nReduces the cooldown of switching between members by 3s, and immediately gains 3 same-colored Signal Orbs after switching to another member.

Name: Memory Chip: Hanna
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nIncreases Extra DMG Bonus by 25% upon a 3-Ping. For every 30s, enters Matrix upon a 3-Ping and gains 1 random Signal Orb.

Name: Signal Buff
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nAutomatically adds 3 Signal Orbs of the same color to the character every 3s.

Name: Support Shield
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nAdds a shield equal to 10% of max HP for 3s in QTE. The shield cannot be stacked. Can repeatedly trigger refresh duration.

Name: Matrix Protect
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nCD time of Matrix reduces by 2s, and give 1 random Signal Orb when entering it.

Name: Dodge Buff
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nDodge Gauge limit increases to 400, and obtain 1 signal orb when dodge is complete.

Name: Intensity Shield
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nAdds a shield equal to 1%/2%/4% of max HP for 8s upon a 1-Ping/2-Ping/3-Ping. This shield cannot be stacked, but can provide Super Armor in whole course.

Name: Switch Buff
Description: Health +1000, HP +200.\nReduces the cooldown of switching between members by 3s, and immediately gains 3 same-colored Signal Orbs after switching to another member.

Name: Shield Activization
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nFor every 1000 shields, three orbs of the same color can be obtained.

Name: Follow-Up
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nEvery damage dealt will deal 1 extra damage, equal to 20% of the original attack. This damage will also be counted toward the total combo.

Name: Super Shield
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nThe number of shield is doubled, and gain 100% Extra DMG Bonus.

Name: Anchor Mark
Description: HP+1000, ATK+200.\nCombo hits up to 200 will add a marked buff to the enemy for 8s. The marked buff will record the damage taken by the enemies during this period, and at the end of the buff, it will deal "damage taken x2" damage to the enemies during the duration of the buff.

Name: Abandoned function
Description: Gains 1 Red Orb in every 3s.

Name: Abandoned function
Description: Gains 1 Yellow Orb in every 3s.

Name: Abandoned function
Description: Gains 1 Blue Orb in every 3s.
